BSC.name: Copycat
BSC.description: Copycat DEX is an on-chain derivatives protocol developed by the Copycat Finance team, offering multi-chain decentralized perpetual contract services for derivatives.
BSC.about: $eCAT tokens will be available for conversion to ECAT on decentralized exchange (DEX), while $CAT tokens will be listed on centralized exchanges (CEXs). Given the lower price point of $eCAT on DEXs, we strongly recommend converting your $eCAT to CAT for the opportunity to sell at a higher price on CEXs.
